Name: AWS - Add or Remove instance from ELBv2
Description: Add or Remove the current instance from an ELBv2 Target Group.

Parameters.Name: accessKey
Parameters.Label: IAM Access Key ID
Parameters.HelpText: The IAM Access Key ID to use when authenticating with AWS.

Parameters.Name: secretKey
Parameters.Label: IAM Secret Key
Parameters.HelpText: The IAM secret access key used to authenticate with AWS.

Parameters.Name: region
Parameters.Label: AWS Region
Parameters.HelpText: The region in which the ELBv2 and Target Group live.

Parameters.Name: targetGroupArn
Parameters.Label: Target Group ARN
Parameters.HelpText: The ARN of the target group.

Parameters.Name: action
Parameters.Label: Action
Parameters.HelpText: Choose if you want to add or remove the current instance from the selected target group.

Parameters.Name: checkInterval
Parameters.Label: State Check Interval
Parameters.HelpText: The number of seconds to wait before checking if the instances has been successfully added or removed from the target group.

Parameters.Name: maxChecks
Parameters.Label: Maximum State Checks
Parameters.HelpText: The maximum number of times to check if the instance has been successfully added or removed from the target group.
